reviews.review: A fun tactical shooter, easy to get into but hard to master
Bedava olması nedeniyle hile sayısında inanılmaz artış oldu ve gerçekten çok sinir bozucu

For the six-seven years I have played this game, I have nothing but positive words about the game itself. Now the community on the other hand is a whole side of the game on its own. If you expect your teammates to be giving you words of encouragement while you are in a 1v1, do not download this game. The community is super toxic and makes it difficult to actually improve in the game.

The worst advancement of a game! One of the best games created with over 20 years of development, ruined in a snap of a finger! 
Came back after a break having that old feeling of playing CS or even better why not CS:GO and what to .. experience! This isn't the CS:GO I played over 2 years ago and not even the same game with over 250 hours of gameplay. When I came back I saw some hilarious character art work, probably made for a hope of lucrative monetization system. And oh, the monetization system... Some boxes of things, made out of cheap sketchy textures... And speaking of cheap, I can't describe how bad the sound development of the game is. A game with one of the most unique sounds aspects - ruined.
I can't tell how disappointed I am that the game became such a misery! I would give it another play, but the negative aspects are too much to bear and the new concept, among with the new aiming system puts the game to a dead end. 
After all, I do see why this became a free concept compared to its predecessors!
